feed.title: Track Motion Ui Design Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: Resources for inspiration, lists of software, libraries and other stuff related to Motion UI design, animations and transitions.

entry.title: Motion Ui Design Updates on Sep 27, 2018
entry.content:
Resources for inspiration / Sites

  • Tympanus codrops â€“ Interactive demos and experiments.
  • Codyhouse â€“ Interactive demos and experiments.
  • Dribbble â€“ Animated shots category on Dribbble.
  • Codepen â€“ HTML/CSS/JS sandbox.
  • Give â€™nâ€™ Go â€“ A curated gallery of Dribbble shots reworked as interactive CodePen pens.
  • capptivate.co â€“ A collection of awesome mobile interfaces.
  • Awwwards â€“ Websites examples of designs with animation.
  • cssanimation.rocks â€“Â CSS animated demos.
  • michaelvillar.com â€“Â experiments by @michaelvillar (Stripe).
  • hakim.se â€“ Experiments by @hakimel.
  • ui-animations.tumblr.com â€“ Animations in software user interfaces.
  • hoverstat.es â€“ A collection of interesting web sites curated by Animade studio.
  • appealing. â€“ A collection of mobile transitions and animations.

Newsletters, podcasts, screencasts / SVG

  • UI Movement - best of the week UI animations newsletter.
  • The UI Animation Newsletter â€“Â newsletter with resources plus helpful advice on how to make web animation work for you coming straight to your inbox each month by @valhead.
  • Web Animation Weekly â€“Â newsletter with articles, videos, book reviews, and other goodies pertaining to the wonderful worlds of web animation and motion design by Rachel Nabors.
  • Motion and meaning â€“ Podcast about motion for digital designers by @valhead and Cennydd Bowles.
  • All The Right Moves â€“ Animation reviews by @valhead.

Resources for inspiration / Pinterest boards

  • Gestures, transitions, animations by Yuri Vetrov.
  • Web UI animation by JRMY LFBV.
  • UX/UI interaction & Motion design by Matthieu Lerat.
  • Animated UX/UI by Julien Tilly.

Resources for inspiration / Processing and other weird, but funny stuff

  • Bees & bombs â€“ Processing experiments by Dave Whyte.
  • PATAKK â€“ Processing experiments by Paolo Zagreb.
  • dvdp â€“ Visual chinatown by davidope.
  • bigblueboo â€“ 3d and processing experiments by Charlie Deck.

Articles / Processing and other weird, but funny stuff

  • How fast should your UI animations be? by @valhead.
  • Getting started with UI motion design by @Molly Lafferty.
  • A Designerâ€™s Guide to Perceived Performance by @Luke Jones.
  • How to Use Animation to Improve UX by @Nick Babich.
  • How To Use Animations and Motion in Web Design by @PageCloud
  • UI Animation: Eye-Pleasing, Problem-Solving by @Tubik Studio.
  • UI Motion Designâ€Šâ€”â€ŠThe Compendium by @Thalion.
  • Creating Usability with Motion: The UX in Motion Manifesto by @Issara Willenskomer.
  • Jedi Principles of UI Animation @Adaptive Path.
  • Micro Interaction; great experience for user engagement @Sneha Munot.
  • UI Animation. Microinteraction for Macroresult @Tubik Studio.
  • The Principles of UX Choreography @Rebecca Ussai Henderson.

Software / Video, gif, presentation

  • Adobe After Effects â€“ The industry-standard animation and creative compositing app lets you design and deliver professional motion graphics and visual effects for film, TV, video and web:
    • Using After Effects for UI Animation Prototypes (ğŸ¥ video).
    • UI Animation tutorials.
    • How to Use After Effects for Web Animation Prototypes (ğŸ¥ video).
    • MtMograph summits (ğŸ¥ video).
    • 30 days of AE (ğŸ¥ video).
    • After Effects CC Essential Training on Lynda (ğŸ¥ video).
    • BodyMovin (â­31k) â€“ Converter from AE to SVG/canvas.
    • Squall â€“ Converter from AE to iOS.
  • Apple Motion â€“ MacOS app for create and edit motion graphics, titling for video production and film production, and 2D and 3D compositing for visual effects.
  • Adobe PhotoshopÂ â€“Â Raster graphics editor that can also produce gif UI animations:
    • 9 Photoshop UI Animation Tutorials.
  • Adobe Flash â€“Â Software for creating vector graphics, animations, games etc..

Software / Visual programming

  • Quartz Composer â€“Â MacOS app with node-based visual programming language for prototyping MacOS/iOS apps:
    • The 4 Minute Guide to Quartz Composer (ğŸ¥ video).
    • Introducing Origami for QC.
    • Origami â€“ A tool for creating modern UI by Facebook.
    • Avocado â€“Â A toolbox for interaction designers.
  • Form â€“ App with a node-based visual programming language for prototyping apps by Google.
  • Principle For Mac â€“Â MacOS app for create animated and interactive user interface designs.

Helpers / HTML, CSS and JavaScript

  • easings.net â€“ Easing functions cheat sheet.
  • cubic-bezier.com â€“ Cubic-bezier visual tool.
  • csstriggers.com â€“Â List of CSS properties thats trigger repaint, reflow or compositing.

Libraries / HTML, CSS and JavaScript

  • Web Animation Infographics â€“ Great (but old) infographic with libraries by used technology.
  • Bouncy Ball â€“ Comparing animation techniques by showing how to bounce a ball with each one.

Libraries / CSS

  • Animate.css â€“ Collections of CSS animations.
  • Effeckt.css â€“Â Collections of UI animations.
  • Bounce.js â€“ Tool for generate nice CSS keyframes animation from js easing function.
  • Animations.css - Collection.
  • Magic animations â€“ Collection.
  • UI buttons â€“ Collection of buttons.
  • Hover.css â€“ Hover effects.
  • Morf â€“ Transitions with custom easing functions.
  • Awesome CSS3 animations â€“Â Library of animations.
  • All Animation â€“ Set of fun animations to make your project sexier.
  • CSS Animate â€“ Tool for easy and fast creating CSS3 keyframes animation.
  • Mantra â€“ Tool for creating keyframes animation.

Libraries / JavaScript

  • GreenSock â€“Â Ultra high-performance, professional-grade animation for the modern web.
  • Velocity.js â€“ Accelerated JavaScript animation.
  • Impulse â€“ High-performance interactions for mobile web.
  • AniJS â€“ Animations by declared data-attributes.
  • Snabbt.js â€“ Minimalistic animation library in JavaScript.
  • Famo.us â€“Â High-performance JavaScript library for animations & interfaces.
  • Processing.js â€“Â JavaScript library for Processing visual programming language.
  • Framer.js (â­5.9k) â€“ Prototyping tool for designing UI, interaction and animation.
  • Dynamics.js â€“ JavaScript library to create physics-based animations.
  • Mo.js (â­19k) â€“Â Motion graphics toolbelt for the web.
  • AnimateTransition â€“Â Library for transition of blocks and popups.
  • Animate Plus (â­6k) â€“ CSS and SVG animation library for modern browsers, performant and lightweight (3KB gzipped), making it particularly well-suited for mobile.
  • Gravitas.js (â­162) â€“Â Super fast physics simulations for JavaScript.
  • Popmotion â€“ JavaScript motion engine that makes creating engaging user interactions quick and simple.
  • anime.js - Lightweight JavaScript animation library.

Libraries / SVG

  • BonsaiJS â€“ Lightweight graphics library with intuitive graphics API and SVG renderer.
  • Vivus.js â€“ Allows you to animate SVGs, giving them the appearence of being drawn.
  • Walkway.js â€“Â Easy way to animate SVG images consisting of line, path, and polyline elements.
  • Transformicons â€“ Animated icons, symbols and buttons using SVG and CSS.

Web animation performance / SVG

  • Jankfree.org â€“ Collection of articles and presentations about browser performance.
  • High performance animations.
  • How to Create Smoother Animations and Transitions in the Browser.

Speeches, presentations, videos / SVG

  • Interface Animations (Mark Geyer) â€“Â Workshop on BlendConf 2014.
  • The future of UX â€“ Animation on the Brain (Rachel Nabors).
  • Designing Complex SVG Animations (Sarah Drasner, Trulia).
  • Designing with animation (Pasquale D'Silva) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Animating Web Experiences (John Allsopp) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Putting Your UI in Motion (Val Head) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Motion design with CSS (Val Head) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Lets move! (Benjamin De Cock, Stripe) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Animating Your UX (Rachel Nabors) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Styling and Animating Scalable Vector Graphics with CSS (Sara Soueidan) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Animating the User Experience (Rachel Nabors) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Designing meaningful animation (Val Head) (ğŸ¥ video).
  • Functional Animation (Sarah Drasner) (ğŸ¥ video).

Guidelines / SVG

  • Android
    • Material design guidelines: Motion

Books / SVG

  • The Web In Motion: Practical Considerations For Designing With Animation by Smashing Magazine.
  • Motion Design for iOS by Mike Rundle.
  • Animation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Futureproof Web Design Techniques. Interaction Design & Complex Animations by @UXPin.
  • CSS animations by @valhead.

entry.content:
Resources for inspiration / Pinterest boards

  • Motion UI by CodeDesign.

Resources for inspiration / Processing and other weird, but funny stuff

  • Misha Kvakin â€“Â Cinema4D and UI experiments.

Software / Video, gif, presentation

  • Apple Keynote â€“ MacOS app for presentations, but also great for high-fidelity animations and prototypes:
    • How To Prototype UI Animations In Keynote.

Software / Visual programming

  • Floid â€“Â MacOS interaction design tool for any platform & device (Web, iOS, Android).

Speeches, presentations, videos / SVG

Guidelines / SVG

    • User Interface Design for iOS 7 Apps (ğŸ¥ video)
    • iPhoto for iOS: UI Progression and Animation Design (ğŸ¥ video)

Books / SVG

How to Share â­â­â­â­â­ / SVG

  • Share on Twitter
  • Share on Facebook

entry.title: Motion Ui Design Updates on May 05, 2015
entry.content:
Libraries / SVG

  • SnapSVG â€” JavaScript library makes working with your SVG assets as easy as jQuery makes working with the DOM.
    • How to Manipulate and Animate SVG With Snap.svg

    • OS X Human Interface Guidelines: Animation
